document_data.name: Temerity
document_data.mainbody: '''Temerity''' was a [[tiefling]] descendant of the [[Toril thirteen]].
document_data.History: In [[1478 DR]], [[Farideh]] and [[Lorcan]] went to Temerity's shop. Lorcan asked for Temerity's assistance for his plan. However, Temerity had made a pact with [[Sairch√©]] and informed her of the presence of Farideh and Lorcan in the city.
document_data.Powers: Temerity had made a warlock's pact with Lorcan but later transferred to Sairche.
